name: Edubridge
description: EduBridge is India's leading Workforce Development Platform that forges fruitful collaborations with corporates and leading organizations serving as enablers to build high performing teams by providing bespoke training and recruitment solutions to create a talent pool that can bridge the gap between the workforce and skilled professionals.
features: programs provide training and create a unique space to make skill development aspirational for youth from underserved pockets of the nation. We foster a culture of innovation, exploration and learning for youth and help corporates contribute to the skilling ecosystem, eventually linking them to employment or entrepreneurial careers.

Hire-Train-Deploy (HTD) is a strategic approach to placing deserving candidates tailored in skills specific to specific job profiles. HTD is the process of sourcing the right fit with accuracy to improve hiring efficiency; training them with pay incentives for competency in the company and deploying them where their skills will be best applied and appreciated.

EduBridge can help with such requirement by managing scaling up and down of the business smoothly, focusing on Core business and can take up outsourced HR functions on EduBridge payroll. We have developed a strong, value-added, third-party payroll based, Staffing model that is focused on effective sourcing, training, deployment, payroll management and performance management and this workforce would be on EduBridge’s payroll.

enhanced_description: EduBridge is India's leading Workforce Development Platform that partners with corporates and leading organizations to build high-performing teams. It provides bespoke training and recruitment solutions, including a strategic Hire-Train-Deploy (HTD) model, to create a talent pool of skilled professionals. EduBridge also offers comprehensive third-party payroll based staffing services, managing outsourced HR functions such as effective sourcing, training, deployment, payroll management, and performance management for the workforce placed on EduBridge's payroll. This service enables businesses to manage scaling up and down smoothly, allowing them to focus on their core operations. The platform aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, making skill development aspirational for youth from underserved pockets of the nation and fostering a culture of innovation and learning, ultimately linking them to employment or entrepreneurial careers.
